title: Prowtech (Campaign Management Platform)
description: A complete CMS-based solution to manage and run digital advertisement campaigns on mall display screens.

title: Prowtech (Android App)
description: Developed a custom Android application using React Native, installed on mall screen devices.

title: Solar By Luminous (Vendor Feedback Dashboard)
description: Developed an internal feedback system for Luminous to manage and track behavioral feedback between vendors and employees.

title: Viccare Victoriavn (E-commerce Health App)
description: An online healthcare platform where patients can book appointments with doctors for both individual and corporate needs.

title: Image Detect Tool
description: Integrate Google Vision API to detect Objects and Labels from Images. I developed a tool using Google Vision API to detect individuals in truck cabins or at Dharam Kanta panels. Enhanced security and accuracy in weighing trucks and heavy vehicles.

title: Google Docs Adv
description: I implemented a user-friendly interface with features like text formatting, document saving, and sharing.

title: Broadmail (Bulk Emails)
description: The frontend is a user-friendly React.js interface, integrating NextAuth.js for secure Google authentication. It's designed for easy navigation, responsive layouts, and seamless CSV file uploads for bulk email sending.

title: URL Shortener
description: A simple and efficient URL shortener web application built with Node.js and Express.js. It allows users to input a long URL and receive a shortened version for easier sharing. The application uses MongoDB for data storage and Tailwind CSS for a clean, responsive design.

title: Backend Safe Notes
description: Our application exposes APIs that allow users to perform CRUD operations. Users can create, read, update, and delete data records effortlessly through these endpoints. Additionally, our application includes User Registration APIs.

title: Note Create Web Application
description: This is a Note Create Web application where users can perform CRUD operations like Create, Read, Update, and Delete Notes. It is built using ReactJS.

title: News Application
description: A dynamic news web application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It seamlessly integrates with a News API to provide real-time news updates. Users can stay informed with the latest headlines and articles in a user-friendly and responsive interface.

title: Neumorphic Calculator
description: A Neumorphic Design Calculator created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Portfolio (HTML & CSS) 1
description: This is my first portfolio created using HTML and CSS.

title: Portfolio (HTML & CSS) 2
description: This is my second portfolio created using HTML and CSS.

description: Capture user IP and live location effortlessly on our website. With Elastic Mail SMTP integration, receive this data securely in your email for instant access to valuable geolocation insights.

title: Random Password Generator
description: A simple Random Password Generator created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
